alert.note: Alert for Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 5:33PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Churchill County through 630 PM PDT... At 532 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 18 miles west of Middlegate moving northeast at 30 mph towards Highway 50. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
